verses.content: Ân lal lai chun Babulon lal Nebukadnezzar a hung lien a, Jehoiakim chu a siehlawah kum thum a um a; chu hnunga chun a nghatsan a, a chungah a hel tah a.
Chun, LALPAIN Kaldai pâwlhai, Suria pâwlhai, Moab pâwlhai, Ammon thla pâwlhai ama thaw dingin a tir suok tah a; a siehlaw zâwlneihai hmanga a hril LALPA thu anga Juda ram chu insuksiettir dingin.
A hmu phâk nawa sawn ding thu chu LALPA thuin Juda ram chungah a hung tlung ta ngei a. Manasse suolnahai le a thilthaw po po le,
pawitâwklo thisen an suo a, Jerusalem chu pawitâwklo thisena a suksip leiin, LALPAIN a ngaidam nuom naw a nih.
Chuongchun, Jehoiakim chan- chin danghai le a thilthaw po po chu Juda lalhai inlal lai chanchin ziekna bua chun a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Chuongchun, Jehoiakim chu a pi le puhai kuomah a in a, chun, a naupa Jehoiakin chu ama aiawiin ân lal tah a.
Chun, Aigupta lal chu a rama inthawkin a hung suok nâwk ta nawh a; Babulon lal chun Aigupta ram vadungtêa inthawka Euphrates vadung chena Aigupta lal ram huop po po a lâk ta sih a.
Jehoiakin chu ân lal ṭantirin kum sâwm le kum riet a na, Jeru- salema chun thla thum ân lal a; a nu hming chu Nehusta, Jerusalema Elnathan naunu a nih.
Chun, a pa thaw dân ang po po thawin, LALPA mithmua thil ṭha nawtak a thaw hlak a.
Chuong lai chun Babulon lal Nebukadnezzar mihai chu Jerusa- lema chun an hang feh a, khuo chu an hang inhuol tah a.
Chun, chuonga a mihaiin an inhuol lai chun Babulon lal Nebukad- nezzar chu khuoa chun a hang feh a;
chuongchun, Juda lal Jehoiakin chu a nu hai dâm, a mihai dâm, a milienhai dâm, a upahai le chun Babulon lal kuomah an va suok a, chun, ân lal kum riet kumin Babulon lal chun a man tah a.
Chun, LALPA hril ang khan, LALPA ina ro po po le lal ina ro po po chu a lâk suok a, LALPA biek ina Israel lal Solomonin rângkachak bûr le bêl a siemhai po po chu a sâtnawi vawng a.

Chun, Jerusalema mi po po, mi lien po pohai, mi hrât huoisen ṭha po pohai dâm, sing khat zet, themthiem le thirsu po po salah a ṭhuoi vawng a; chu rama mi a pasie sie ti lo chu tukhawm an um ta nawh a.
Chun, Jehoiakin chu Babulon- ah a ṭhuoi a; chun, lal nu hai, lal nuhmei hai, a upahai dâm, chu rama mihrâthai chu Jerusalema inthawkin Babulonah salah a ṭhuoi a.
Chun, Babulon lal chun pasal- ṭha po po sâng sari zet le, themthiem le thirsu sâng khat, mi hrât ṭha indo thei mi ṭhieu chu Babulonah salah a ṭhuoi vawng a.
Chun, a pa unau Mattania chu Babulon lal chun ama aiin ân laltir a, a hming chu Zedekia tiin a thlengpêk a.
Zedekia chu ân lal ṭantirin kum sâwmhni le kum khat a na, Jerusa- lemah kum sâwm le kum khat ân lal a, a nu hming chu Hamutal, Libna khuoa Jeremia naunu a nih.
Chun, Jehoiakim thaw dân ang po po thawin LALPA mithmua thil ṭha nawtak a thaw hlak a.
LALPA lunginsenna leia a hmu phâk nawa a hnawthmang dai chenin Jerusalem le Juda chungah thil a hung tlung pei a nih; chun, Zedekia chu Babulon lal chunga chun a hel tah a.
